Bootstrap
=========

Need to get developing on Building Energy stuff?  Want to use Flint?  Yeah, you do.  So get started!

```bash
python -c "$(curl -fsSkL https://raw.github.com/buildingenergy/bootstrap/master/bootstrap.py)"
```
